column1: Uchi////- Second...the food. I tried the wagyu beef which was extremely greasy and it had no seasoning at all. It was very disappointing; simply marinating this meat could do so much. I got the biendo tempura shrimp spring roll
column3: but it had barely any shrimp in it. I tasted more vegetables than anything. Â We also got the shag roll and it was very good. I struggled to like the hamachi nabe it was extremely slimy with the egg all over it
column4: but the flavor profile was ok. The grilled shishito peppers were bland
column5: but with the sauce they were amazing. The portions were EXTREMELY SMALL so unless you want to end up with a $200+ bill
